title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 2607.3 - Project eligibility determination
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 2607.3 - Project eligibility determination

State Regulations

The corporation shall not provide NYBFLP financial assistance
to a beginning farmer unless and until the corporation has made a written
determination that the project is an eligible project, and that all applicable
requirements of the corporation have been met. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
2607.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
